metadata.title: CVE-2021-3185 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the gstreamer h264 component of gst-plugins-bad before v1.18.1 where when parsing a h264 header, an attacker could cause the stack to be smashed, memory corruption and possibly code execution.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-bad1.0 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu1').
